altername_name: Roi Lion, Le: La Formidable Aventure de Simba
Le Roi Lion - Les Adventures de Simba
Koenig der Loewen, Der: Simbas grosses Abenteuer
name: The Lion King: Simba's Mighty Adventure
overview: As the young lion prince Simba, you'll grow to discover what it means to be rightful ruler of the Pride Lands. But first you'll have to outrun a wildebeest stampede, escape a wildfire and more! There's never a dull moment when you're King of the Beasts!
